meta.description:

The goal of this event is to predict the price of Bitcoin in USD on the first of September, 2019. The prediction that is closest to the value wins the prize pool! The price consists out of the sum of all predictions that have been placed (10 Ñ¦ each), plus an additional 150 Ñ¦ sponsored by myself.
